text: <@U2H3TT8F2>  Are there anymore HubSpot certifications that are designer/developer focused ? I can only see "HubSpot CMS for Developers Certification" and nothing else

Not currently. While we donâ€™t have an additional developer focused certifications, we do have an API course <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/introduction-to-HubSpot-apis>

I also recommend to all developers building on the HubSpot platform the Inbound certification. The Inbound Marketing certification also would be beneficial. While these certifications are not developer specific, they clue you in to how marketers are using the platform, and why things work the way they do.

Hi everyone! I am trying to figure out how to add *optional* sections/modules to email templates (so that my client could choose to turn a specific section on or off when creating a new email). I found this info, but cannot seem to find anything on how to actually implement optional sections! <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Email-Marketing-Tool/Variable-Number-of-Modules-in-Email-Template/m-p/258191/highlight/false#M2666>
